properties.Name: Einstök Ölgerð
properties.description: Einstöl ölgerð is located just 60 miles south of the Artic Circle in the fishing port Akureyri. There, the water flows from rain and and prehistoric glaciers down the Hlidarfjall mountain and through ancient lava fields, delivering the purest water on earth, and the perfect foundation for brewing deliciously refreshing craft ales.

properties.Name: Bruggsmiðjan Kaldi Brewery
properties.description: Our goal is to make a high quality beer and chose the best ingredients available. All ingredient comes from Czech Republic and then we use our Icelandic water that comes from a mountain called Sólarfjall.The outcome is Kaldi: Icelandic beer, brewed by century old Czech method, unpasteurised, without preservatives and added sugar.

properties.Name: Segull 67 Brewery
properties.description: We are a small family owned craft brewery located in fishing village of Siglufjörður, Iceland, my grandfather, my father and I, as well as the family helps out. The brewhouse is in an old fish factory that we have designed and adapted. Segull means magnet in Icelandic and we are connecting it to the magnet needle (magnetic north) in the compass. The magnetic needle always turns north no matter where you are.

properties.Name: ASKUR TAPROOM - Bar & Brewery
properties.description: We offer a great selection of local beer from Austri Brewery.

properties.Name: Steðji
properties.description: Steðji beer is not just a beer, its an alchemy of pure genius. Our brewer is a German professional, Philipp Ewers, who is a magician for a brewer. We are in the possession of our own fountain of pure spring water. The water has been tested and proven to be among the purest and cleanest sources of water found in the world.

properties.Name: Ölvisholt Brewery
properties.description: Ölvisholt Brewery is a microbrewery located at an old dairy farm in south Iceland, near Selfoss. It was founded in the year 2007 by two neighbouring farmers who had a true passion for beer. This passion is the not-so-secret ingredient in all the beers Ölvisholt brews today. An old barn was re-purposed to house the small brewery and this is where our skilful brewmaster conjures up some of the best beers Iceland has ever produced.

properties.Name: Ölverk Pizza & Brewery
properties.description: Ölverk began its own beer production in October 2017 and produces craft beer on site. The motivation behind Ölverk lies in our passion for premium wood fired pizza and fine craft beer. Our reputation for excellent high-quality craft beer has spread widely in the short time since opening. The unique use of geothermal energy in the brewing process has piqued the curiosity of our adventures guests.

properties.Name: RVK Brewing Company
properties.description: RVK Brewing Company was born out of pure and simple passion for good beer. After working for years in the New York City finance sector our founder Siggi found out his true passion. Good Beer. And making it. And spreading out the word about good beer in Iceland.

properties.Name: Ægisgarður
properties.description: Micro Brewery and tap room at Eyjarslóð 5 in Reykjavík. Open to the public from 12-16 weekdays except tuesdays from 12-14. Drop by for a tasting platter!

properties.Name: The Brothers Brewery
properties.description: Beer is our water, don’t spend time drinking anything else.

properties.Name: Smiðjan Brugghús
properties.description: They are a mystery brewery in Vík.

properties.Name: Jon Riki
properties.description: Jón Ríki Brewery / Restaurant is a family owned and operated business. Focusing on first class produce and quality malts allows us to offer good quality seasonal food and innovative craft beers.

properties.Name: Dokkan Brugghús
properties.description: Dokkan is the Westfjords first and only brewery, that brews high class craft beer. Our micro brewery is a small family business founded in Isafjorður in October 2017 merely for the purpose to make local craft beer and the Westfjords really needed one. Then our first beer was made in the early summer of 2018.

properties.Name: Beljandi Brewery
properties.description: On Icelands national holiday 17. Juni 2017 did two local guys open a brewery in Breiddalsvík. They brew high quality beer and have the most amusing pub in the country, as they self claim.

properties.Name: Borg Brugghús
properties.description: Borg Brugghús is a progressive craft brewery founded in 2010 whose principal aim is to incorporate Icelandic cultural traits and local ingredients to its wide variety of beers and pair with food. Borg Brugghús has already received numerous awards at some of the world‘s most noted and influential competitions.
